Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz105.png'}
{2: 'Nun', 3: "Looks like we're at the right place. The Central Purification Filter is still running in this city."}
{2: 'Nun', 3: 'Its efficiency is decreasing, but it should still last a few months.'}
{2: 'Black-clad Man', 3: "If you weren't bringing a whole group of children, the army would have never guard you on your journey."}
{2: 'Black-clad Man', 3: "Now that you're here, you'll have to take care of yourselves."}
{2: 'Nun', 3: "I know—That's why we've been taking those kids with us."}
{2: 'Black-clad Man', 3: '...'}
{2: 'Nun', 3: 'Is there a problem?'}
{2: 'Nun', 3: "It's always been us ostracized servants of God who protect and feed the children during warfare."}
{2: 'Nun', 3: "Of course we're allowed to rely on the charity of you soldier folks in these critical hours."}
{2: 'Black-clad Man', 3: "No, it's just... Saying it so bluntly in your position, it's making me a little... Forget it..."}
{2: 'Black-clad Man', 3: 'Anyway, the shelter below this church belongs to you now.'}
{2: 'Black-clad Man', 3: 'But the supplies...'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "A-achoo! Lucia, I'm cold..."}
{2: 'Nun', 3: "W-what's that sound? Is it... a Corrupted?"}
{2: 'Black-clad Man', 3: 'Come out! Or else—'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory60.jpg'}
{3: 'The black-clad man is about to pull out his gun, but seeing the two small figures in the corner, he quickly returns it.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Lucia, holding Luna's hand, walk slowly out of the darkness."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nun', 3: 'Where did these two little girls come from...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nun', 3: 'Go go go, go somewhere else, this place is already...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Black-clad Man', 3: 'Hey!'}
{2: 'Nun', 3: 'Two more mouths to feed it is.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nun', 3: "From today onwards, you two'll come with me.", 4: '1'}
